trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> objects.
The SchemaImporterExtensionCollection is accessed through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter.Extensions%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A megadott sémaimportáló bővítmény hozzáadása a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to add.
The index of the added extension.
Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A megadott sémaimportáló bővítmény hozzáadása a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: The *name* parameter allows you to supply a custom name for the extension.
trans-unit.target: A *neve* paraméter lehetővé teszi, hogy a kiterjesztés egy egyéni nevet adjon meg.

trans-unit.source: A custom name for the extension.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to add.
The index of the newly added item.
The value of *type* does not inherit from <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref>.
Clears the collection of importer extensions.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified importer extension exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy létezik-e a megadott sémaimportáló bővítmény a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to search for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a kiterjesztés található; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> to the specified array of <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> objects at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Másolja át az aktuális összes tagjának <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"> </xref> a megadott tömb <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"> </xref> objektumok a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to copy the current collection to.
The zero-based index at which the collection is added.
trans-unit.target: Amellyel jelenik meg a gyűjtemény nulla alapú indexét.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified item and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
trans-unit.target: A megadott elem keres, és visszaadja az első olyan gyűjteményen belüli nulla alapú indexét.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to search for.
The index of the found item.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A meghatározott beszúr <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"> </xref> a gyűjteményhez, a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: The zero-base index at which the `extension` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: A zero-base index, ahol a `extension` kell beilleszteni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to insert.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The index of the item to find.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref>, specified by name, from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"> </xref>, megadott neve, a gyűjteményből.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to remove.
The name is set using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection.Add%28System.String%2CSystem.Type%29> method.
trans-unit.target: A név használatával be a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection.Add%28System.String%2CSystem.Type%29> metódust.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension"></xref> to remove.
